Posts.Content: oh andi - you have gone through so much - and i appreciate you telling what you have been through - i meet with oncologist monday morning and am bringing a good friend who is a nurse with me - yes, this is agressive - when i get my course of treatment i would love to pick your brain - your infromation has been very helpful -- good luck and prayers to you and thanks for yours - hope you enjoy the nice weather (at least its nice here in new england)   amf923
Posts.Title: Triple Negative Tumors

Posts.Content: hi andi - i was just diagnosed with triple negative ductal invasive too - caucasion 49 year old - i found my lump - it's painful too - i met with oncologoist monday - have had breast mri - pet - and now am having a bone scan and chest ct scan - 2.5 x 3.5 cm - all in all - pretty scary - i did not know that there were subtypes of cancer - i just thought it was "breast cancer" - oh well, i am glad i found this board - i am keeping my spirits up and hope you all do the same - a good friend of mine described this as a "major inconvenience" - let's all pray it's just that for all of us!! I am currently in nursing school and no one seems to have heard of this triple negative thing - keep us updated   amf923
Posts.Title: Triple Negative Tumors
